description: This file is a React entry point initializing the application and rendering the root component 'App' into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for React rendering from the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component that activates additional checks and warnings for its descendants.
